patthana22.5:1.1_0: Nakusalo nasappaccayo dhammo kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo ….
patthana22.5:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana22.5:3.1_0: Nakusalo naanidassano dhammo kusalassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.5:3.1_1: (Nava pañhā kātabbā.) Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate nava.
patthana22.5:4.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:4.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana22.5:5.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:5.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.5:6.1_0: Nakusalaṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:6.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana22.5:7.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:8.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:8.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana22.5:9.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:9.1_1: Nakusalaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā abyākato lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:9.1_2: (Cha pañhā kātabbā.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana22.5:10.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:10.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana22.5:11.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:11.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
